404798/Hn ccFishTank.14: speak Willy "They certainly did what they promised. The boulder is completely gone..."
404798/Hn ccFishTank.18: speak Willy "This stream is flowing from deep within the heart of the mountain."
404798/Hn ccFishTank.29: speak Willy "...Hmm? How curious... what is that?"
404798/Hn ccFishTank.35: speak Willy "Oh my! That just might be... yes, ore blessed with the magic of the mountain!$h"
404798/Hn ccFishTank.41: speak Willy "Of course, I should've expected this... such powerful energies under such great pressure..."
404798/Hn ccFishTank.45: speak Willy "This is most fortunate. Do you know what this means, now?"
404798/Hn ccFishTank.49: speak Willy "Gold panning, evergreen one!$h#$b#I'm sure you're excited. Please, let me just..."
404798/Hn ccFishTank.52: speak Willy "...Yes, it's in here somewhere. Willy had a copper pan for just this thing... he'd want you to have it."
404798/Hn ccFishTank.68: speak Willy "There we are... it's yours now. If you ever see magical-looking glistening in the water, use that pan and you'll surely find good results."
